org.springframework.core.log

Class LogAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.core.log.LogAccessor

  • public class LogAccessor
extends Object
    A convenient accessor for Commons Logging, providing not only CharSequence based log methods but also Supplier based variants for use with Java 8 lambda expressions.
    Since:
    5.2
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogAccessor(Class<?> logCategory)
      Create a new accessor for the specified Commons Log category.
      LogAccessor(Log log)
      Create a new accessor for the given Commons Log.
      LogAccessor(String logCategory)
      Create a new accessor for the specified Commons Log category.
